src:
Asiatisk frihandelsuppgörelse dröjer
Sedan 2012 har Kina arbetat för att få med sig 16 länder i Asien i frihandelsuppgörelsen RCEP. Men efter samtal under det pågående Aseanmötet i Bangkok står det klart att uppgörelsen skjuts ytterligare på framtiden och kan bli verklighet tidigast 2020.
03 Nov 2019, 10:45 by TT

text:
Asian free trade settlement is delayed
Since 2012, China has worked to include 16 countries in Asia in the free trade agreement RCEP. But after talks during the ongoing Asean meeting in Bangkok, it is clear that the settlement will be pushed further into the future and may become reality by 2020 at the earliest.
03 Nov 2019, 10:45 by TT
